    • Constructor Detail

      • MapperController

        public MapperController(java.lang.String queryFilePath,
                        java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> subjectFolderPaths,
                        java.util.concurrent.Future<MapBlock> queryFrequencyMap,
                        java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.util.concurrent.Future<MapBlock>> subjectFrequencyMapQueue,
                        CosineSimilarityController csController,
                        int shingleSize)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Basic constructor
        Parameters:
        queryFilePath - path of query file
        subjectFolderPaths - path of subject folder
        queryFrequencyMap - holds a Future of the query file map
        subjectFrequencyMapQueue - holds the future of each subject file map
        csController - the CosineSimilarityController which created this instance
        shingleSize - number of characters to be used in each shingle
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown by subjectFrequencyMapQueue put() method

      • MapperController

        public MapperController(java.lang.String queryFilePath,
                        java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> subjectFolderPath,
                        java.util.concurrent.Future<MapBlock> queryFrequencyMap,
                        java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.util.concurrent.Future<MapBlock>> subjectFrequencyMapQueue,
                        CosineSimilarityController csController,
                        int shingleSize,
                        int queueCapacity)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Basic constructor
        Parameters:
        queryFilePath - path of query file
        subjectFolderPaths - path of subject folder
        queryFrequencyMap - holds a Future of the query file map
        subjectFrequencyMapQueue - holds the future of each subject file map
        csController - the CosineSimilarityController which created this instance
        shingleSize - number of characters to be used in each shingle
        queueCapacity - the capacity of each BlockingQueue used
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown by subjectFrequencyMapQueue put() method

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Start a service for the query file and each subject file, each service returns a Future of type MapBlock. Query file future is assigned to queryFrequencyMap. Subject file futures are placed on the subjectFrequencyMapQueue.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown by subjectFrequencyQueue put() method
